About

Originally from Florida, I have gradually moved north over the years before setting down roots in Charlotte, NC. I'm excellent at juggling multiple tasks, working under pressure, and love being a part of a collaborative team. My experience includes Marketing & Graphic Design, Customer Service, and managing Print Production. I have recently completed an intense front-end engineering course at the Iron Yard and have the passion to further my education.

Contact

Feel free to send me a note at heather@heatheramler.com
